The main character is Ye Xiu. Ye Xius sister is Su Mucheng. Su Mucheng is/was the captain of Excellent Era. Chen Guo plays for Happy. Ye Xiu has an account called Unrivaled Super Hottie. Ye Xiu made the Unrivaled Super Hottie account. The Unrivaled Super Hottie account is a knight class. Su Muqiu made the design for the Myriad Manifestation Umbrella.
Correct!! Incorrect :( Are you sure you want to cheat? I\'m sure! YOU WON! :) Cheat Cheating is wrong!
